Package ca.cs.ualberta.localpost.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EditComment
    This Activity allows users to edit a previously posted comment or reply
    FavoritesView
    View that Displays all of the users favourited comments
    FreshestTabView
    This View will show all the comments that are sorted by points, distance from user and and recent date
    GPSLocation
    Class that implements the location services Source: http://www.androidhive.info/2012/07/android-gps-location-manager-tutorial/
    GreatestTabView
    Displays and orders comments that are sorted by greatest points
    LastestTabView
    Displays and order comments that were sorted by date (Most Recent dates will be first)
    MainActivity
    Main code was provided from Android Hive.
    MapsView
    MapsView is a class that communicates with several other views to display users or comments location on map Called when user submits or edits a comment; when user location is changed and when the map thread option is selected
    NoPicTabView
    Displays comments that don't have pictures
    PicTabView
    Displays comments that have pictures
    ReadLaterView
    View that Displays all comments that a user marked as 'read later'
    SubmitComment
    This activity allows the user to submit a new comment or a new reply
    ThreadView
    Displays a comment and all the replies associated with the comment
    UserProfile
    This view will display a users information The user will be able to change their user name, view their comment history, view their favourited comments and their read later
